text: Enterprise applications are complex
& have a lot of dependencies.
Which can make cloud migration a big headache
—  determining the right tools to use
can be costly for your time and resources alike.

That’s where the AWS Migration 
Hub Orchestrator comes in.
From the Migration Hub,

you can plan, orchestrate, 
and track your application migration
across both AWS & 3rd party solutions.

So that you’ll spend less time tracking 
down the status of individual tasks
& more time on the big picture.

With insight gained through 
thousands of application migrations,

the Orchestrator identifies 
and applies proven patterns

to optimize prescriptive workflows 
that speed up the migration process.
That means more insight,

empowering you to know what 
migration tools to use and in what order.

With full customization options
 within the Orchestrator,

system admins can modify and 
adapt our templates, processes,

tools and dependencies 
to meet their unique needs.

And, by automating the manual tasks 
involved in migrating enterprise applications,

system admins can manage their migration process 
within one unified platform to see the full picture,
Charting  the dependencies between different tools,

and gaining visibility into the migration process 
for reduced costs and time to completion.
We know migrating applications can be difficult,
so we made it easier
with the AWS Migration Hub Orchestrator.
